title: The two Premier League superstars who Barcelona have identified as their dream Nico Williams alternatives
description: While many around Catalonia might have been shocked last summer following Hansi Flick’s arrival, Barcelona embarked on a sensational rise under the ex-Bayern Munich boss. Reclaiming their La Liga crown and enjoying an iconic silverware sweep, the Spanish heavyweights are already starting to put preparations together over defending their crown next season. However, while the […] The post The two Premier League superstars who Barcelona have identified as their dream Nico Williams alternatives appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Real Madrid 3-2 Borussia Dortmund: Mbappe overhead kick seals semi-final spot
description: Real Madrid held on through late drama to book their place in the Club World Cup semi-finals with a 3-2 victory over Borussia Dortmund on Saturday. Los Blancos had looked to be cruising into the final four, but Dortmund scored twice in stoppage time on either side of Kylian Mbappe’s overhead kick, with Dean Huijsen […] The post Real Madrid 3-2 Borussia Dortmund: Mbappe overhead kick seals semi-final spot appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
